answers.answer: Reduce salt intake and talk to your doctor.
If your face is swelling, it could be a symptom of preeclampsia. Talk to your Dr.

Rest your feet where possible, wear comfy shoes, do foot exercises eg rotate the foot 8 times one way then the other. But I agree with above comments, you should seek medical advice if your face is swelling, even if just as a precaution. Particularly if it's quite sudden in the face, hands or feet. Pre-eclampsia isn't to be taken lightly, be safe :)

How far along are you? If you're more than 20 weeks along go to the hospital or call your doctor they need to check you for preclampsia. I'm at high risk for it and they remind me symptoms every appointment. Swelling of the face is one of them

question: Anything for face legs and feet swelling. Besides drinking more water
title: swelling
